an4.6:4.3: Appassuto sutena anupapanno, appassuto sutena upapanno, bahussuto sutena anupapanno, bahussuto sutena upapanno.
an4.6:4.4: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno?
an4.6:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa appakaṃ sutaṃ hoti—
an4.6:4.6: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
an4.6:4.7: So tassa appakassa sutassa na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
an4.6:4.8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno.
an4.6:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno?
an4.6:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa appakaṃ sutaṃ hoti—
an4.6:5.3: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
an4.6:5.4: So tassa appakassa sutassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
an4.6:5.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno.
an4.6:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno?
an4.6:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa bahukaṃ sutaṃ hoti—
an4.6:6.3: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
an4.6:6.4: So tassa bahukassa sutassa na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
an4.6:6.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno.
an4.6:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno?
an4.6:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa bahukaṃ sutaṃ hoti—
an4.6:7.3: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
an4.6:7.4: So tassa bahukassa sutassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
an4.6:7.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno.
an4.6:7.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasminti.
